actions.command: execute as @e[type=minecraft:illusioner,tag=one] at @p run tp @s ~2 ~ ~ facing entity @p
execute as @e[type=minecraft:illusioner,tag=two] at @p run tp @s ~-2 ~ ~ facing entity @p
execute as @e[type=minecraft:illusioner,tag=three] at @p run tp @s ~ ~ ~2 facing entity @p
execute as @e[type=minecraft:illusioner,tag=four] at @p run tp @s ~ ~ ~-2 facing entity @p
